title: Avoidme
author: Avoidme
created_time: October 24, 2023, 04:49:48 PMLast edit: November 23, 2023, 04:20:21 AM by Avoidme
content: AssetLink Bounty officially Ended        *Website*    *Telegram**Twitter* Whitepaper*  *Facebook* * 1. Every participant should create an account  here  2. Total $6K (Every week 1500$) worth of $ASET tokens are to be divided according to the stakes accumulated amongst selected participants. Reward will be distribute on weekly basis.3. The bounty program was launched on October 25th, 2023 and will run until November 24th, 2023. 4. Team will distribute the reward after the end of presale and the end of the campaign. The team looks me very strong and communicative. So, hope it will be distributed in time.5. If team found the bounty program is not effective than they will pause the bounty program and distribute the token calculating the duration accordingly.6. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC if needed. TERMS AND CONDITIONS1. Every participant should create an account  here and submit the registered email address and ASET deposit address(from website) in the bounty registration form.2. Telegram and Twitter Requirements:   - All participants must join the AssetLink's TelegramGroup,Facebook, and Twitter Follow on medium: https://medium.com/@ativolabs--subscribe to youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/@AtivoLabs   - All participants must join the BTT Bounty Manager's TelegramGroup,Telegram Channel, and Twitter.   - Discussing the bounty program in the project chat group will result in immediate disqualification from the     campaign and a permanent ban from the company chat group. Please direct your bounty-related questions to     the BTT Bounty Managers's Group.3. Misconduct and Violations:   - Any participant found engaging in unethical or fraudulent practices during any campaign will be disqualified.   - Participants using offensive language or participating in any form of financial misconduct will be disqualified.4. Adherence to Rules:   - Participants are required to follow the rules outlined in these campaigns. Failure to do so will result in rewards      not being granted as per the campaign's terms, and no negotiations will be entertained.5. Disqualification Consequences:   - Disqualified members will forfeit all the coins they have earned, and this action is irreversible.   - Disqualified members will not be individually notified about their disqualification. To review your status, please check the Status sheet.6. Weekly Reporting:   - All participants must submit their weekly reports for social campaigns on this bounty thread. Stakes will be   calculated on a weekly basis, and you are required to create new reports each week. Edited reports and proof of   authentication will not be counted. Here is report format Code:Week:Bitcointalk Username:Telegram Username:Reddit username:Youtube Profile LinkMedium profile Link[b]Twitter Campaign[/b]Twitter Profile Url:Spreadsheet No:Retweets Url:1. …2. …3. …4. …Tweets URL1...2...[b]Telegram Campaign[/b]Telegram Username:Spreadsheet No:Telegram posts Url:1. …2. …3. …4. …5. … 7. Authentication Proof:   - It is mandatory for all participants to submit proof of authentication in the campaign thread they are     participating in. Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username: Forum Profile Link: Telegram Username: Participated Campaigns:  ASET  Wallet Address:8. Stake Updates:   - Stakes will be updated on a weekly basis.Please ensure that you read and understand these terms and conditions thoroughly before participating in the bounty program. Violating these terms may lead to disqualification and the loss of earned rewards. Twitter              40%Telegram          20% Video                 20%Article               20% Week 1 (25.10 -31.10)Week 2 (01.11 - 07.11)Week 3 (08.11 - 14.11)Week 4 (15.11 - 22.11)Rewards:1. Participants with more than 200 followers: 1 stake per week2. Participants with more than 500 followers: 2 stakes per week3. Participants with more than 1000 followers: 3 stakes per week4. Participants with more than 5000 followers: 4 stakes per weekRules:1. All participants must follow AssetLink’s official Twitter Page.2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 200 followers.3. Participants are required to create 2 new tweets and retweet 4 tweets each week.4. There should be a minimum 24-hour gap between each retweet or tweet.5. In each retweet or tweet, should mention 2 friends, coincise but valuable comment , incorporate following hashtags: #AssetLink $ASET #RWA #RealEstae @ativolabs.How to join:1. Join AssetLink's TelegramGroup,Facebook, and Twitter.Follow on medium: https://medium.com/@ativolabs--subscribe to youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/@AtivoLabs2. Join BTT Bounty Manager's TelegramGroup,Telegram Channel, and Twitter.3. Complete the registration form by clicking on this link: [TWITTER FORM]Rewards:- Earn 5 stakes per week. Each Constructive post will get 1 stake. (Max 5 post)Rules:1. Update your Telegram name to "Your Name | AssetLink Ambassador."( Not mandatory from week 3)2. Replace your profile picture with the AssetLink Logo  provided. ( Not mandatory from week 3)3. Participants may represent only one project at a time. Having multiple project names in your Telegram display name will result in disqualification from the campaign.4. Ensure that your Telegram username is visible to all while you are in the community. Interact using the same Telegram account used for campaign registration. Failure to comply will result in the forfeiture of all earned stakes.5. Contribute at least 5 constructive messages in the AssetLink Telegram chat group and chat with other members,no spamming, meaningful message about the project and the industry.6. Spam or deleted messages will not be counted. Avoid using "#" hashtags in your conversations.7. Weekly, report the links to your Telegram messages. Please follow the specified reporting dates and format.8. You must remain in the Telegram group until the campaign's conclusion to receive your stakes.9. Maintain the Moe avatar and text throughout the campaign to receive your stakes.How to join:1. Join AssetLink's TelegramGroup,Facebook, and Twitter.Follow on medium: https://medium.com/@ativolabs--subscribe to youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/@AtivoLabs2. Join BTT Bounty Manager's TelegramGroup,Telegram Channel, and Twitter.3. Complete the registration form via this link: [Telegram FORM] Rewards:- High quality: 3 stakes- Good quality: 2 stakes- Average quality: 1 stakeRules:1. Each participant is allowed to write a maximum of 8 original articles (not more than 2 per week).2. Articles must be of high quality, unique, and contain a minimum of 300 words.   - You may use official images, logos, and graphics from our website.3. Stakes will be awarded based on article quality and the level of engagement, among other criteria.4. Articles should be published on recommended blogging platforms: Steemit, Medium, and LinkedIn, and must be publicly accessible.5. The content of the articles should revolve around relevant topics, such as Project features, Staking/Liquidity rewards, Presale, the latest project's token updates, Blockchain, and so on.6. Only high-quality, original content will be accepted. Removal or deletion will result in disqualification.7. Published articles must include at least 2 images related to the project and provide links to Proof of Authentication, the project's website, Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel, or any other social media.8. At the end of the article, please provide sufficient details about the writer to ensure authenticity. This information will be verified.9. By participating in this program, participants acknowledge that the project's team may use these articles as marketing materials.How to join:1. Join AssetLink's TelegramGroup,Facebook, and Twitter. Follow on medium: https://medium.com/@ativolabs--subscribe to youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/@AtivoLabs2. Join BTT Bounty Manager's TelegramGroup,Telegram Channel, and Twitter.3. Complete the registration form by clicking on this link: [Article Form]. Rewards:- High quality: 3 stakes- Good quality: 2 stakes- Average quality: 1 stakeRules:1. Each participant is permitted to submit a maximum of 8 original videos, with a limit of not more than 2 videos per week.2. Participants must have a minimum of 100+ YouTube subscribers or 1000+ TikTok followers. Videos should be a minimum of 3 minutes in length for YouTube and less than 1 minute for TikTok. Creating YouTube videos is encouraged and will earn an additional stake.3. Video content must be focused on relevant topics such as project features, the latest updates on the project's token, blockchain, etc.4. Only original video content will be accepted.5. Face-cam videos are highly recommended and will be given additional consideration, although videos without a face-cam are also accepted. Face-cam and high-quality animation videos will earn extra stakes.6. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and the overall quality of the video.7. Videos should not be removed or deleted. Removal or deletion will lead to disqualification.8. All videos must include links to the Proof of Authentication, the project's website, Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel, or any other relevant social media.9. At the end of the video, provide sufficient details about the producer (bounty hunter) to ensure authenticity. This information will be verified.How to join:1. Join AssetLink's TelegramGroup,Facebook, and Twitter. Follow on medium: https://medium.com/@ativolabs--subscribe to youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/@AtivoLabs2. Join BTT Bounty Manager's TelegramGroup,Telegram Channel, and Twitter.3. Complete the registration form by clicking on this link:[Video Form]   Disclaimer: This bounty campaign operates without an official escrow service. I cannot provide a guarantee regarding the distribution of rewards upon the campaign's conclusion. However, I have confidence in the team's strength and communication capabilities. Therefore, I hope that rewards will be distributed as planned and in a timely manner. Participation in this bounty campaign, investment in their ICO/IDO/IEO, or utilization of their platform is at your own discretion and risk. I cannot be held responsible in the event that the developers or project team fail to meet their stated goals or obligations to bounty participants, investors, or any other stakeholders.
